titleStmt.title: The Relation of the rejoycings made in Rome for the birth of the most serene Prince of Wales only son of James the Second, King of Great Britain, defender of the faith, &c. / faithfully translated into English, from the Italian impression, as it was printed at Rome and Genoa.

notesStmt.note: Running title: The rejoycings at Rome for the birth of the Prince.
"The work is not authentic--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
